name: PLOGG it!! Place blogging
short_description: PLOGG it!! is a Place Blogging web app.Everybody can have a PLOGG to write anything related to places,e.g.plogg your university exchange,world/business trips,holidays,or just what you do in your town.PLOGG it!! is just another fancy Google Maps Mashup.
